about_the_game:
This DLC enables adult (uncensored) content during the romance CG scenes and nudity in several points of the story. Two new buttons will be added in the options screen which will let you change Tori's armor outfit, optional nudity, and explicit sex scenes/texts.

Requires the main game Tales From The Under-Realm: Hazel to download
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1394550/Tales_From_The_UnderRealm_Hazel/

content_descriptors.notes:
Contains explicit uncensored sex scenes, as well as frequent nudity.

All characters included in the game are over the age of 18.

This DLC is only for those who are of legal age and wish to see such content.

detailed_description:
This DLC enables adult (uncensored) content during the romance CG scenes and nudity in several points of the story. Two new buttons will be added in the options screen which will let you change Tori's armor outfit, optional nudity, and explicit sex scenes/texts.

Requires the main game Tales From The Under-Realm: Hazel to download
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1394550/Tales_From_The_UnderRealm_Hazel/
name: TFTU - Hazel Uncensor Patch

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 and newer
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 20 MB available space

short_description: The uncensor patch enables adult content on the game Tales From The Under-Realm: Hazel
